title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models via Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings, retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, user auth).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, syntax highlighting, shortcuts.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-copilots
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama-powered code completion and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) and Docker Compose examples.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate code, refactor, and chat with Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Lightweight Next.js chatbot template that talks to local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Official example notebook showing how to generate embeddings with Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and embedding pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# SDK for Ollama with .NET 8 and nullable reference types.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run Ollama prompts on selected notes and insert AI-generated text.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for team-wide LLM queries.

title: ollama-whatsapp
summary: WhatsApp bot via Twilio that chats with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting, and showcase of Ollama projects.
